schemas.title: JSON Schemas used in payloads
schemas.description: Paths to JSON Schemas of payload node types, edge types, hyperedge types and hypergraph. When they are relative, the reference is the base directory of the metadata file.

node_types.description: The list of declared node types, along with the JSON Schemas to be used for their payloads

edge_types.description: The list of declared edge types, along with the JSON Schemas to be used for their payloads

is_directed.description: Is this edge type representing directed edges?

is_symmetric.description: Is this edge type representing edges which fulfil symmetric property?

weight.description: Not all the edge types have weights. When they have, these properties are used to describe the edge

hyperedge_types.description: The list of declared hyperedge types, along with the JSON Schemas to be used for their payloads

node_types.description: The allowed node types for the nodes involved in the hyperedges

is_tuple.description: Is this hyperedge type representing a tuple, where its number of nodes always matches the number of allowed node types?

is_directed.description: Is this hyperedge type representing directed edges?

is_symmetric.description: Is this hyperedge type representing edges which fulfil symmetric property?

weight.description: Not all the hyperedge types have weights. When they have, these properties are used to describe the edge
